alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 2:03PM MDT until March 26 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT /4 AM CDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma County. In Kansas, Cheyenne and Rawlins Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy and Hitchcock Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT /4 AM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility down to a quarter mile.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
